section.p: This template records the act of supplying medications (i.e., dispensing).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7453, CONF:1098-10505, CONF:1098-32580 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medication Dispense template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7455), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Fill Status 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.64 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32361)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7457)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7473, CONF:1098-7474, CONF:1098-15606)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-7459, CONF:1098-15607)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunization Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-9331, CONF:1098-31696)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information (V2) or one product/Immunization Medication Information (V2) template (CONF:1098-9333)
SHALL conform to Medication Dispense template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7451, R2.0=CONF:1098-7451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7452, R2.0=CONF:1098-7452)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Prescription Number) (CONF:7454, R2.0=CONF:1098-7454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7455), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Fill Status 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.64 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32361)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Dispense Date) (CONF:7456, R2.0=CONF:1098-7456)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7457)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Dispensed) (CONF:7458, R2.0=CONF:1098-7458)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:7461, R2.0=CONF:1098-7461)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:7467, R2.0=CONF:1098-7467)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468, R2.0=CONF:1098-7468)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7473, CONF:1098-7474, CONF:1098-15606)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:15607, CONF:15608, CONF:9333)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-7459, CONF:1098-15607)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunization Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-9331, CONF:1098-31696)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information (V2) or one product/Immunization Medication Information (V2) template (CONF:1098-9333)

body.codeblock: <supply xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="SPLY" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2100662173"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <repeatNumber value="1"/> <quantity/> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1254906926"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <repeatNumber value="1"/> <quantity/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1160539449"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> </supply> </entryRelationship> </supply>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7453, CONF:10505 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18"
Consol Medication Dispense supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:15607, CONF:15608, CONF:9333)
SHALL conform to CDA Supply
Consol Medication Dispense SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7451, R2.0=CONF:1098-7451)
Consol Medication Dispense SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Dispense Date) (CONF:7456, R2.0=CONF:1098-7456)
Consol Medication Dispense SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Prescription Number) (CONF:7454, R2.0=CONF:1098-7454)
Consol Medication Dispense SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7452, R2.0=CONF:1098-7452)
Consol Medication Dispense SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (Fill Number) (CONF:7457)
Consol Medication Dispense SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Fill Status 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.64 STATIC 1 (CONF:7455)

Consol Medication Dispense MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Order Information) such that it (CONF:7473, CONF:7474, CONF:15606) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)
Consol Medication Dispense SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Dispensed) (CONF:7458, R2.0=CONF:1098-7458)
Consol Medication Dispense MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer, where its type is Performer (CONF:7461, R2.0=CONF:1098-7461)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Performer2
Consol Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Medication Dispense Assigned Entity (CONF:7467, R2.0=CONF:1098-7467)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Medication Dispense Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468, R2.0=CONF:1098-7468)
